pullRequest.title: Crash fix of null profile exception on CourseOutlineFragment.java
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
LEARNER-7917

Crash Fix on CourseOutlineFragment.java occurring due to auth exception

nodes.bodyText: environment.getLoginPrefs().getCurrentUserProfile() better to store in local variable and then use it.
